title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Deep thinking about your life today leads to colorful epiphanies about your next steps toward the future. Setting aside time to be alone with your thoughts -- whether by writing, meditating, or ruminating -- allows you to probe whats going on within the recesses of your mind. As you explore your rich inner life, you might also spot more ways to align your daily choices with your beliefs and principles. Plant the first seed in your imagination and watch it grow. Satirist Jonathan Swift wrote, "Vision is the art of seeing what is invisible to others." Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
